name: sound-collector
description: An attempt to migrate the [RPTF database](https://github.com/RadioPreservationTaskForce/rptf-database) to a static site driven by a JS search engine.

scripts.include-npm-deps: mkdir -p assets/vendor && cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js assets/vendor &&  cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js assets/vendor && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js assets/vendor && cp node_modules/lunr/lunr.min.js assets/vendor && cp node_modules/paginationjs/dist/pagination.min.js assets/vendor && cp node_modules/lodash/lodash.min.js assets/vendor && cp node_modules/bootstrap-icons/icons asset/vendor
scripts.jekyll:build: npm run include-npm-deps && npm run jekyll build
scripts.netlify:build: npm run jekyll pagemaster collections && npm run jekyll:build
